dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: I knew this little sidetrack would not be fruitful for you. The girl is set on her ways.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Though this brief visit allowed me to learn something vital.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: It seems that those who reside in her world now have methods of escaping out of the digital space into the mortal world.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: And the stench of Daddy Dearest's kin... It permeates her world as well.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: That girl and her boyfriend were there, and they know something.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: With your new abilities, we can catch them the next time they try to enter the digital world.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Thenâ€¦ I'll take that boy's body and escape this electronic prison. And you will be able to follow suit.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: There are hundreds more girls like her in the outside world, ones with the free spirit you desire.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: The time for revenge is nigh.
